title: Bought the wrong thins in BE Store
body:
Dunno where I should post this but I wanted to get the moneybags emote and I accidentally purchased the 75K purple gem/icon package.  Since the BE store is limited time and I'm not sure if that icon will be available again am I just screwed? I have 0 refunds left as of my like 2nd month of playing and I'm not too sure it would work that way anyway. 

TL;DR Bought the wrong thing in the BE Store. Is there anyway to refund the stuff from the temporary BE store so I can get the one thing I actually wanted?

replies.body: It'd definitely be worth reaching out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for sure!
